long: Meaning: probably a "force", whether of men, means or other resources; an "army", "wealth", "virtue", "valor", "strength".  Usage: able, activity, ( ) army, band of men (soldiers), company, (great) forces, goods, host, might, power, riches, strength, strong, substance, train, ( ) valiant(-ly), valour, virtuous(-ly), war, worthy(-ily).  Source: from "H2342";
